attributes.action: open more bridleways for horse riders and carriage drivers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the amount of horses in the uk reaching a all time high i think there should be bridleways opened as the roads are a very dangerous place these days as most drivers have no concideration!also stables should be notified of any bridleways opened in there area.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "open more bridleways for horse riders and carriage drivers!."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15574.asp

Prime Minister's Office
